node.category: What is the way things are?
What about opening shops on Sundays and holidays?
How could opening shops on Sundays and holidays affect small shops?

node.surface: Owner-run shops may potentially be overwhelmed by additional work times on Sundays and holidays,

node.category: Are there a lot of owner-run shops?

node.surface: then again supermarkets and large shopping centres dominate the market today already.
Thus smaller shops could benefit from the additional freedom,

node.category: Why could smaller shops benefit from the additional freedom?

node.surface: as customers are on average more laid-back on Sunday.

node.category: Who would benefit from opening shops on Sundays and holidays?

node.surface: Opening on Sundays and holidays would therefore help both customers and shops.
